item.title: Sway: The brief introduction to tiling window managers
item.description: I can’t lie to you that I’ve had some free time these days, which I’ve taken advantage of to learn about GNU/Linux Desktop. By installing it on two laptops, I’ve been able to learn about the kernel and the Ubuntu and Fedora operating systems. However, when I began my journey, I was playing in a safe environment like GNOME, this window manager that provides almost all the tools you need to start without having to tinker too much.
